full_summary:
## Acquisition of Ozone Monitors
### Brief Description:
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is soliciting bids for the acquisition of ozone monitors to measure real-time ozone concentrations in indoor environments. The equipment must be capable of detecting extremely low concentrations (near zero to several parts per billion) and be quiet enough to not disrupt occupants.

### Details:

| Title | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | CB-986-19237744 |
| **Solicitation Number** | 23-58121 |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-09-28 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-10-23, 14:00:00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2023-11-01 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2024-03-29 |

### Annexures:

* [Notice of Proposed Procurement - Avis de Projet de Marché](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20964/23-58121_npp-notice-of-proposed-procurement.avis-de-projet-de-marche-apm.pdf)
* [Request for Proposal - Acquisition d'Ozone Monitors](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20964/23-58121_rfp_acquisitionozonemonitors.pdf)
* [Question and Answer - Questions et Réponses](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20964/23-58121_qa_qr_2.pdf)
* [Question and Answer - Questions et Réponses](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20964/23-58121_qa_qr_1.pdf)
